Currencies

Source: R/others.R
get_currencies.Rd

List of currencies Yahoo Finance supports.

Usage

get_currencies()

Value

Symbol, short and long name of the currencies.

Examples

# \donttest{
get_currencies()
#>     short_name                           long_name symbol
#> 1          FJD                       Fijian Dollar    FJD
#> 2          MXN                        Mexican Peso    MXN
#> 3          LVL                        Latvian Lats    LVL
#> 4          SCR                   Seychellois Rupee    SCR
#> 5          CDF                     Congolese Franc    CDF
#> 6          BBD                    Barbadian Dollar    BBD

#> 8          CLP                        Chilean Peso    CLP

#> 11         MXV             Mexican Investment Unit    MXV
